channel.description: Recent content in Mobile application development on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Globo plc Logo
Globo Plc provides enterprise mobility management and mobile application development software and services. Globo is listed on the London Stock Exchange’s AIM market"Share price information". Retrieved 27 January 2015. Globo acquired Notify Technology in October 2013, adding Mobile Device Management capabilities to its EMM product offering and expanding its operations in the USA. In June 2014, Globo acquired Sourcebits, a designer and developer of apps. On 23 October 2015, trading in Globo shares was suspended.
You can download theGlobologo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Globo
item.description: Globo Plc provides enterprise mobility management and mobile application development software and services. Globo is listed on the London Stock Exchange’s AIM market"Share price information". Retrieved 27 January 2015. Globo acquired Notify Technology in October 2013, adding Mobile Device Management capabilities to its EMM product offering and expanding its operations in the USA. In June 2014, Globo acquired Sourcebits, a designer and developer of apps. On 23 October 2015, trading in Globo shares was suspended.
